content:
CatalogZoneDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides design-time support for CatalogZone controls.

Syntax

Declaration

public class CatalogZoneDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner

Remarks

CatalogZoneDesigner provides design-time rendering of CatalogZone controls. It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.

The public AutoFormats and TemplateGroups collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.

Constructors summary

CatalogZoneDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the CatalogZoneDesigner class

Properties summary

AutoFormats

Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the Auto Format dialog box for the associated control at design time.
TemplateGroups

Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.

Methods summary

GetDesignTimeHtml()

Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time by calling the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml* method with a null argument.
GetDesignTimeHtml(DesignerRegionCollection)

Creates an EditableDesignerRegion in the designer before generating the design-time HTML of the control.
GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion)

Gets the content for the specified EditableDesignerRegion.
GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml()

Gets the markup to represent an empty control.
Initialize(IComponent)

Binds the designer to the associated CatalogZone control.
SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion,String)

Sets the content of the specified EditableDesignerRegion.

Constructors

  • CatalogZoneDesigner()

    Initializes a new instance of the CatalogZoneDesigner class

    public CatalogZoneDesigner ();

Properties

  • AutoFormats

    Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the Auto Format dialog box for the associated control at design time.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection AutoFormats { get; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerAutoFormatCollection

      A pre-specified DesignerAutoFormatCollection with a default CatalogZone scheme.

    Remarks

    The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the CatalogZone class.

  • TemplateGroups

    Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection TemplateGroups { get; }

    Property Value

    • TemplateGroupCollection

      A pre-specified TemplateGroupCollection with default settings for a CatalogZone environment.

    Remarks

    The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the CatalogZone class.

Methods

  • GetDesignTimeHtml()

    Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time by calling the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml* method with a null argument.

    public override string GetDesignTimeHtml ();

    Returns

    • String

      A method call to stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml* with a null argument as the parameter.

  • GetDesignTimeHtml(DesignerRegionCollection)

    Creates an EditableDesignerRegion in the designer before generating the design-time HTML of the control.

    public override string GetDesignTimeHtml (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);

    Parameters

    • regions
      DesignerRegionCollection

      The DesignerRegionCollection, if any, associated with the control.

    Returns

    • String

      A String representing the design-time HTML of the control.

  • GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion)

    Gets the content for the specified EditableDesignerRegion.

    public override string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region);

    Parameters

    • region
      EditableDesignerRegion

      The specified EditableDesignerRegion.

    Returns

    • String

      A String that represents the persisted form of the designer region's content.

  • GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml()

    Gets the markup to represent an empty control.

    protected override string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml ();

    Returns

    • String

      An empty String.

  • Initialize(IComponent)

    Binds the designer to the associated CatalogZone control.

    public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);

    Parameters

    • component
      IComponent

      The associated CatalogZone control.

  • SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(EditableDesignerRegion,String)

    Sets the content of the specified EditableDesignerRegion.

    public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);

    Parameters

    • region
      EditableDesignerRegion

      The specified EditableDesignerRegion.

    • content
      String

      A String that represents the content to go in the specified region.
